about_the_game:
Welcome, you brave seeker of paradise!

Welcome to Puzzle Pop Paradise, the ultimate erotic drag 'n drop puzzle challenge! Dive into a steamy world of unique, seductive imagery featuring 40 pictures of 10 gorgeous women, each with their own irresistible allure. Solve puzzles to unlock tantalizing scenes and complete your gallery of sultry masterpieces.

Each piece brings you closer to uncovering the treasures of paradise—sexy, satisfying, and made just for you. Ready to pop into the hottest puzzle adventure yet? Paradise is waiting!

What do you get?

40 Unique Images: More then enough to get your rocks off.

10 Beautiful Girls: A girl for every taste—enjoy an eclectic mix!

Gallery Mode: Spend some quality time with your unlocked treasures in the gallery. We won't judge 😉.

Do we have any future plans?

Yes we do. Make sure to stick around for our...

Up n' Coming: DLC Femboy and Furry fetish goodness 🥵. 

We hope to release both our Femboy and Furry DLC in the next coming months so keep a look out for it!

Wishlist Puzzle Pop Paradise now! You cheeky little gooner, you... 🍆

content_descriptors.notes:
Puzzle Pop Paradise contains adult themes and content that is only suitable for certain ages. Characters are shown in revealing positions and genitalia is often seen.

All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 18.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 Display recommended

name: Puzzle Pop Paradise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 4th Gen or similiar
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 Display recommended

short_description: Piece together 40 unique, erotic images of 10 stunning women in their most seductive poses. Each puzzle is a step deeper into paradise— complete, unlock and revel in your gallery of sensual masterpieces.
